summary: Songwriter Stephin Merritt is known as "the Cole Porter of his generation" for his memorable melodies, lovelorn lyrics and wry musical stylings. Shot over a period of 10 years, "Strange ... See full summary Â»

title: Strange Powers: Stephin Merritt and the Magnetic Fields
